title: Input schema for the youtube-search-scraper actor
description: This is actor accepts YouTube channel URLs and returns details from their corresponding 'about' pages.

startUrls.title: Direct URLs
startUrls.description: Provide some direct Youtube urls, like channel urls or search urls. When provided, it disables search.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: The best option is usually Automatic proxy. But you can also use your own proxies or no proxy
